website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy punching bag stand with numerous features and a sleek design by a top brand in the industry.
pros: A rugged model that features tough steel components in an easy-to-assemble design
Can hold a heavy bag – up to 100 pounds – and has space for a second smaller bag
Streamlined shape earns praise for not taking up too much space
cons: Pricier than others on our list
Some reports of missing hardware upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Stand Only!
customer_reviews.text: It’s only the stand. No punching bag or speed bag included.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge_Orwa

customer_reviews.title: This thing is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed the stand, laid out all the parts so I could assemble it. Once I started, I figured out that the majority of the thin metal was bent, dinged up or was just really low-quality. Now I have something I wasted 160 something dollars on that I can’t return and serves no purpose. Do not buy this item it sucks. Also the backboard for the speed bag is made of particle board. This thing is terrible
customer_reviews.author: robert c. zeek

customer_reviews.title: Slides every where
customer_reviews.text: This iwouldn't recommend. It moves all over the place even on a mat. Im constantly moving it cause it is always sliding when you hit it even if your not hitting it hard. My 15 yr old and 7 year old even make it move ever where. I put in for a refund but haven't heard back from the company. Probably will have to file a claim if they don't reply soon.
customer_reviews.author: QueenShopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is nice. Quality control could be better as some parts were bent and needed to be straightened before assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows the stand with bags. That's what I thought I was buying. When my grandson opened the box. He was very disappointed. I had to order the bags separately. It would have been much less expensive and easier had I just gone to Dick's Sporting Goods.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Some issues but usable
customer_reviews.text: I like this product although I do think it should come with weights to keep it steady! I also think the speed bag station needs to be more stable also, but other than those issues it’s not bad my 9 year old loves it and so do I
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Only the stand is included!
customer_reviews.text: From the pictures I was under the impression the kit comes with all the bags included, especially the heavy bag. Product was not what I expected because the pictures have everything included.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was not complete
customer_reviews.text: Product came with NO bolts, nuts, washers etc. Since it’s a Christmas gift I didn’t have time to return and/or re-order... Bought fasteners at hardware store to put together....Very disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Worthless item
customer_reviews.text: The picture is misleading if it’s just going to be the stand then it should say stand only or have a picture of just the stand with out the bags. Definitely felt like I got robbed. Item is not worth $160
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very solid except for speed bag mount
customer_reviews.text: Nice stand! Does not come with heavy bag or speed bag. Speed Bag wooden mount broke it appears to be made out of particle board.
customer_reviews.author: JPS - Plymouth MA

customer_reviews.title: Very Deceptive Ad.
customer_reviews.text: Only the stand is included, which isn't what the picture displays, and I can't find where it says that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Punching bag
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son and he loves it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ginni

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: perfect set up....2 hours to assemble......getting a da8ly workout now
customer_reviews.author: Brad hutton

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Description of product did not indicate the bags were not included. Pieces were bent. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Carman

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The promo for this item is misleading. The pic makes people think it comes with the bags. That was intentionally done.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah askins

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and easy to assemble. The only gripe I have is that the speed bag back board is wobbly when hit from any direction other than to the center of the stand. Not a big deal. The picture makes it look like it includes the heavy bag but it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BU, over priced and doesn't come with ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT BU, over priced and doesn't come with punching bag and speed kit.. The pictures should indicate that bag is sold separately. Dicks has a complete set for $199.
customer_reviews.author: Pally Investment

customer_reviews.title: Missing Item #4 Missing item #2 Missing 4000 Heavy Bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing Item #4 Missing item #2 Missing 4000 Heavy Bag. Missing #4215 Speed bag Missing #4223 Double End Ball Missing 2116 Pro Style Boxing Gloves. Missing 4455BP Hand Wraps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it pretty well. I had one issue after about two weeks the speed bad board broke completely off of the frame. It was already bolted to the frame so it wasnt an assembly fault of mine. The board is particle board so an inevitable problem. No other issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky LeBaron

customer_reviews.title: Only Stand No BAG!
customer_reviews.text: I should suggest change ur picture too so u wont scam other people for 3 stationed mma everlast bag stand im trying to work out here doing the pandamic times. just blowed my money and i gotta buy a seperate bag now thanks alot
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a dime
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get all of the pieces and the instructions for the pieces I did have weren't clear
customer_reviews.author: Meka

customer_reviews.title: Nice set up except for speed bag swivel.
customer_reviews.text: Not commercial by any means but good for the basement, foot print is relatively small, which works well for my needs. Only complaint was with the speed bag swivel and platform. Swivel is junk and I needed to beef up the mount by adding 2 round pieces of table top wood (comes pre-cut at Home Depot) then glue & screw together. Speed bag bounces much better with less movement from the platform. Other than that good set up.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sold

customer_reviews.title: This is just the stand.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't say it comes with the bags, it only says three station, which it has all 3.
customer_reviews.author: Triforce of Gay

product_meta.title: Three-Station Heavy Duty Punching Bag Stand by Everlast , 54.00 x 54.00 x 84.00 Inches
